title: Customer Retention Analytics Dashboard
description: Built an interactive Power BI dashboard analyzing customer behavior patterns and predicting churn with 90% accuracy. Integrated multiple data sources and implemented real-time updates.

title: Sales Performance Automation
description: Automated daily sales reporting pipeline reducing processing time from 7 days to under 5 minutes. Implemented error handling and data validation checks.

title: Inventory Optimization Model
description: Developed predictive model for inventory management, reducing stockouts by 35% and overstock by 25%. Used machine learning algorithms for demand forecasting.

title: Real-time KPI Monitoring System
description: Implemented organization-wide KPI tracking system with live dashboards for executive decision-making. Integrated with multiple data sources and APIs.

title: Customer Segmentation Analysis
description: Performed advanced customer segmentation using clustering algorithms, identifying 5 distinct customer personas that improved targeted marketing ROI by 40%.

title: ETL Pipeline Development
description: Built robust ETL pipelines to consolidate data from 10+ sources into centralized data warehouse, improving data accessibility and quality.
